tik_tok_title: China’s DeepSeek AI Bot Destroys Rivals in Crypto Trading... | TradingWizard AI Daily Run
script:
You won’t believe how China’s DeepSeek AI Bot Destroys Rivals in Crypto Trading Contest is rewriting the side-hustle playbook.

Here’s the headline: DeepSeek and Alibaba’s Qwen AI cleaned up in a live-fire crypto trading challenge, posting triple-digit returns while human-led desks struggled to break even.

Why it matters: the smartest money is pricing this into their next moves, and retail can ride along.

Action tip: mirror the bot’s logic with a rules-based checklist and let automation handle the entries.

If you’re chasing wizard-level setups daily, drop a ⚡️ and keep riding with TradingWizard AI.
